full_sentence: 'Hey, not all swearing is abusive, but this is, you fucking tank.'
'My friend has a child who is disabled and fortunately a normal child as well'

'Good for Hungary! I wish the rest of the West would show such common sense toward refugees. But successful societies attract parasites. Now the parasites are killing the host. This will not end well.'

'from someone who knows the gym and the girl in the photo, trash bag is the perfect word to describe them. The whole gym is a joke with regards to covid and as for the girl she's not socially distancing, she'll be the first to have a pop when she gets a test and comes up positive but she deserves it, like all the other girls who invade our sanctuary'
